inlineContent.text: Petrel provides a complete Swift implementation of the AT Protocol APIs, enabling developers to build applications that interact with Bluesky and other AT Protocol-based services. The library features automatic code generation from Lexicon specifications, modern Swift concurrency support, and robust authentication handling.
